name: edgesense_exported_graph
title: Edgesense interaction graph
description: The online community is represented as a social network. Nodes represent users; edges represent interactions across them, in the form of comments. Information on Edgesense: http://github.io/edgesense

attributes.title: target
attributes.description: Identifies the node that is the end point of the edge.

attributes.title: networkxkey
attributes.description: An identifier used by the networkx library to compute graph metrics.

attributes.title: source
attributes.description: Identifies the node that the edge originates from.

attributes.title: team
attributes.description: Takes value 1 if the source user has any role other than ordinary active user (for example has admin powers), as encoded in the users database table.

attributes.title: effort
attributes.description: The length in characters of the comment encoded in the edge.

attributes.title: ts
attributes.description: The date and time of creation of the edge, in UNIX time format.

attributes.title: created_ts
attributes.description: The date and time of creation of the account for this user, in UNIX time format.

attributes.title: isolated
attributes.description: Takes value 1 if the user has had no interactions with any other users, i.e. if she gives rise to a singleton node in the graph.

attributes.title: created_on
attributes.description: The date and time of creation of the account for this user, in human-readable format.

attributes.title: link
attributes.description: A link to the profile of this user.

attributes.title: team
attributes.description: Takes value 1 if the user has any role other than ordinary active user (for example has admin powers), as encoded in the users database table..

attributes.title: link
attributes.description: Takes value 1 if the node is active.

attributes.title: team_ts
attributes.description: The date and time at which the user acquired admin role, or any role other than ordinary active user. Expressed in UNIX time.

attributes.title: team_on
attributes.description: The date and time at which the user acquired admin role, or any role other than ordinary active user. Expressed in human-readable format.
